file_content.text: Oh, you're back! Thanks again for escorting that convoy. Lieutenant Larbec and Master Burkan wanted to speak with you--let me contact them.
The convoy! You made it! Dalo, get down here and get these dewbacks into the loading bay so we can unpack 'em, right away!
And medpacs! Let the doc know, so he can get the treatments started on the double.
Master Burkan? This is Cason. The convoy just arrived--we're all set here.
Fantastic! I can't thank you enough. Your help has put the Troida Military Workshop back on track!
The Empire's interests are my own.
I have done my duty.
I quite enjoyed myself, actually. Think nothing of it.
It was fun!
You have honored us greatly with your help, my lord.
Another day, another satisfied customer.
Just doing my job.
Oh yes, quite satisfied! And your reward will reflect that, I assure you.
It's my duty to ensure that the Empire's operations run smoothly.
No problem.
People like you make me proud to be a part of the Empire--very proud!
Good thing you found me.
I'll say! We were incredibly fortunate that you came along.
I have things to do. If all you want is to thank me, I'll be going.
Are we done here?
I'm, uh... I'm sorry if I've bothered you. I just wanted you to know your time is appreciated.
Given your assistance in this matter, I had hoped you could help with another.
Greetings.
